hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:In the year of the conquest of Mecca, the Prophet (ﷺ) entered Mecca from Kada' at the higher place of Mecca. (Hisham, a sub-narrator said, " `Urwa used to enter (Mecca) from both Kada' and Kuda and he often entered through Kada' which was nearer to his dwelling place

chapter.ara-name: باب مِنْ أَيْنَ يَخْرُجُ مِنْ مَكَّةَ
